info.name: Image labeling with pretrained models
info.description: Use any other Edge Impulse project to label your dataset (image classification or object detection). You can upload any pretrained model by creating a new project, and selecting 'Upload your model'.

parameters.name: Source project
parameters.help: Project to use as a labeling source

parameters.name: Impulse ID
parameters.help: Optional impulse ID, if not selected we'll use the last used impulse.

parameters.name: Delete existing bounding boxes?
parameters.help: If any existing bounding boxes are present, remove them (only applies to object detection datasets).

parameters.name: Only keep bounding boxes with label
parameters.help: If this field is filled, only bounding boxes in this field are returned (only applies to object detection datasets). E.g.: bottle, person discards any other bounding boxes. To remap add the remapped label in parenthesis e.g. 'bottle (beer)'
parameters.hint: Separate labels by a newline. To remap, add the remapped label in parenthesis, e.g. 'bottle (beer)'.
